21  void InverseRealFFT::execute(Cmatrix& indata, Dmatrix& outdata) throw (bad_matrix_size) {
22  if ((indata.size1() != outdata.size1()) || (outdata.size2() / 2 + 1 != indata.size2())) {
23  throw bad_matrix_size("InverseRealFFT::execute");
24  }
25 
26  if (outdata.size2() != mLogicalSize) {
27  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
28  }
29  if (mPlanNeedsUpdate) {
30  mLogicalSize = outdata.size2();
31  MakePlan();
32  }
33 
34  size_t isize1 = indata.size1();
35 
36  for (size_t i = 0; i < isize1; i++) {
37 
38  fftw_execute_dft_c2r(
39  mPlan,
40  (fftw_complex*) & indata(i, 0),
41  (double*) &outdata(i, 0)
42  );
43 
44  }
45  }
46 
47  void InverseRealFFT::operator()(SeqViewComplex& in, SeqViewDouble& out) {
48  // Get data
49  Cmatrix* data_in = in.GetData();
50  Dmatrix* data_out = out.GetData();
51 
52  // Check dimensions
53  if ((data_in->size1() != data_out->size1()) || (data_out->size2() / 2 + 1 != data_in->size2())) {
54  LogWarning("InverseRealFFT: resizing output array (%d,%d)->(%d,%d)", data_out->size1(), data_out->size2(), data_in->size1(), 2 * (data_in->size2() - 1));
55  data_out->resize(data_in->size1(), 2 * (data_in->size2() - 1));
56  }
57 
58  execute(*data_in, *data_out);
59 
60 
61  // Adjust attributes
62  out.SetStart(0.0);
63  out.SetSampling(1.0 / in.GetSlice());
64  out.SetScale(in.GetScale() * in.GetSampling());
65 
66 
67  }
68 
69  void InverseRealFFT::execute(Cvector& indata, Dvector& outdata) throw (bad_vector_size) {
70  if ((indata.size() != outdata.size() / 2 + 1)) {
71  throw bad_vector_size("InverseRealFFT::execute");
72  }
73  if (outdata.size() != mLogicalSize) {
74  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
75  }
76  if (mPlanNeedsUpdate) {
77  mLogicalSize = outdata.size();
78  MakePlan();
79  }
80 
81  fftw_execute_dft_c2r(
82  mPlan,
83  (fftw_complex*) & indata(0),
84  (double*) &outdata(0)
85  );
86  }
87 
88  void InverseRealFFT::execute(CmatrixRow& indata, DmatrixRow& outdata) throw (bad_vector_size) {
89  if ((indata.size() != outdata.size() / 2 + 1)) {
90  throw bad_vector_size("InverseRealFFT::execute");

105  }
106 
107  void InverseRealFFT::execute(CmatrixRow& indata, DmatrixRow& outdata, unsigned int insize)
108  throw (bad_vector_size) {
109  if (insize > indata.size()) {
110  throw bad_vector_size("InverseRealFFT::execute");
111  }
112  if ((insize != outdata.size() / 2 + 1)) {
113  throw bad_vector_size("InverseRealFFT::execute");
114  }
115  if (outdata.size() != mLogicalSize) {
116  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
117  }
118  if (mPlanNeedsUpdate) {
119  mLogicalSize = outdata.size();
120  MakePlan();
121  }
122 
123  fftw_execute_dft_c2r(
124  mPlan,
125  (fftw_complex*) & indata(0),
126  (double*) &outdata(0)
127  );
128  }
129 
130  void InverseRealFFT::MakePlan() throw (std::runtime_error) {
131  if (mPlan) {
132  fftw_destroy_plan(mPlan);
133  }
134 
135  fftw_complex *in = (fftw_complex*) fftw_malloc(sizeof (fftw_complex)*(mLogicalSize / 2 + 1));
136  double *out = (double*) fftw_malloc(sizeof (double)*mLogicalSize);
137 
138  mPlan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(mLogicalSize, in, out, FFTW_UNALIGNED | mPlanningRigor | mPlanningRestriction);
139  if (mPlan == NULL) {
140  throw std::runtime_error("InverseRealFFT::MakePlan");
141  }
142  fftw_free(in);
143  fftw_free(out);
144  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
145  }
